description: Header file defining functions for device number allocation and retrieval related to Zigbee legacy security. It declares functions for allocating device numbers, retrieving device number or EUI64, clearing temporary device numbers, and setting device numbers for devices.

methods.name: allocateDeviceNumber
methods.description: Gets the next available legacy security device number and persists it on the device.

methods.name: getDeviceNumberForDevice
methods.description: Gets the device number used by the specified device from persistent storage.

methods.name: getEui64ForDeviceNumber
methods.description: Retrieve the EUI64 of the device possessing the provided device number.

methods.name: clearTemporaryDeviceNumbers
methods.description: Clear any temporary device numbers used during pairing.

methods.name: setDeviceNumberForDevice
methods.description: Set the device number for a device; primarily used for migrations.
